hero.title: Turning Marketing Spend Into
hero.subtitle: I'm Amir Gomez, and for the past 10 years, I've helped 100+ businesses transform their marketing from cost centers into profit drivers. My approach is simple: data-driven strategies, proven frameworks, and results that speak for themselves.

story.title: My Story
content: My journey into digital marketing began with a pivotal moment that shaped everything I do today. Back in 2016, while helping a local business launch their first Google Ads campaign, I discovered that traditional metrics only tell part of the story. After analyzing their $5,000 spend over two weeks, I realized the key wasn't just getting clicksâ€”it was understanding what actually drives profitable growth.

That experience became my foundation for success. I spent the following year reverse-engineering every high-performing campaign I could find, deconstructing landing pages, analyzing winning ad copy, and testing relentlessly. The breakthrough came when I shifted focus from surface-level metrics to true revenue attribution. Suddenly, campaigns that appeared modest on vanity metrics were actually generating substantial, profitable customer acquisition.

Over the past 8 years, I've had the privilege of scaling businesses from local service providers to 8-figure e-commerce brands, contributing to over $150 million in revenue generation. Each campaign has taught me something valuable, and each success has strengthened the proven framework I now implement with every clientâ€”from Ethan Allen and BMW to innovative startups across multiple industries.

Today, my approach combines rigorous data analysis with strategic creativity and AI-powered optimization. I build scalable systems that optimize for long-term customer value and transform marketing spend into predictable, sustainable business growth. Whether it's achieving a 20x ROAS for manufacturing clients or growing organic traffic by 5.3x using AI-powered SEO strategies, I focus on delivering measurable results that directly impact your bottom line.

beliefs.title: What I Believe
items: Marketing should be measurable and accountable to revenue
Customer lifetime value is more important than acquisition cost
Transparency builds trust and better results
Continuous testing leads to continuous improvement

process.title: How I Work
items: Start with comprehensive audit and strategic planning
Implement tracking and measurement systems first
Launch campaigns with clear success metrics
Optimize based on performance data, not assumptions
Scale what works, eliminate what doesn't

q1.question: What happens during the consultation?
q1.answer: We'll review your current marketing performance, discuss your goals, and I'll provide specific recommendations for improvement. You'll leave with actionable next steps.

q2.question: Is there really no cost?
q2.answer: Yes, the initial consultation is completely free. My goal is to provide value upfront and help you understand how I can help your business grow.

q3.question: What if I'm not ready to hire anyone?
q3.answer: No problem! I'll still provide valuable insights you can implement yourself. There's no pressure to work together beyond the initial consultation.
